questions.question: The rabbit .......................... across the field.

questions.question: I was ........................... that you could lend me a pound.
questions.description: To hope is to expect and want something to happen. The different forms of this verb are: hope / hoping / hoped.

questions.question: She ........................ the skirt to match her blouse.
questions.description: To dye is to color. The different forms are: dye / dyeing / dyed

questions.question: The rough surface of the floor made ........................ difficult.
questions.description: To mop is to clean by wiping. The different forms are: mop / mopping / mopped

questions.question: I slipped and .......................... an elbow.
questions.description: To scrape is to bruise. The different forms are: scrape / scraping / scraped

questions.question: The witness .......................... to the jury.
questions.description: To lie is to speak falsely. The different forms of this word are: lie / lying / lied

questions.question: The king ............................ now in his final resting place.
questions.description: Lie can mean recline. The different forms of this verb are: lie / lies / lying / laid or lain

questions.question: It is a mistake to .............................. too much emphasis on grades.
